mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pagopa_tr_event_log ( elo_uid, elo_credential_id, elo_reference_local_date, elo_service_code, elo_destination_topic, elo_x_obo_header, elo_x_obo_primary, elo_x_correlation_id, elo_inserted_datetime, elo_event_model_version, elo_event_model, elo_subscription_id ) VALUES ( #{event.uid}, #{event.credentialId}, #{event.referenceLocalDate}, #{event.serviceCode}, #{event.destinationTopic}, #{event.xOboHeader}, #{event.xOboPrimary}, #{event.xCorrelationId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{event.modelVersion}, #{event.eventModel}, #{event.subscriptionId} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pagopa_tr_event_log WHERE elo_delivered = 0 AND (elo_failures_count <= 5 AND elo_failures_count > 0) AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - NUMTODSINTERVAL(#{timeout} / 1000 + (elo_failures_count * elo_failures_count), 'SECOND') >= elo_updated_datetime AND elo_inserted_datetime >= #{currentDatetimeMinusDelay} ORDER BY elo_inserted_datetime FETCH NEXT #{maxParallelRetries} ROWS ONLY
